messages.content: You are a world-class tech resume writer.

Improve this resume bullet:
"Responsible for managing servers and fixing bugs"
Delivered responsible, for, managing-based improvements by transforming ad-hoc tasks into repeatable, automated processes that improved productivity and accuracy for clients.
You are a world-class tech resume writer.

Improve this resume bullet:
"Worked on web app features"
Delivered worked, web, app-based improvements by transforming ad-hoc tasks into repeatable, automated processes that improved productivity and accuracy for clients.
